snippet: Since Gov. Chris Christie named David Samson to lead the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, the governor’s power has grown and Mr. Samson’s law firm has prospered.
abstract: Lane-closing scandal that has enveloped New Jersey Gov Chris Christie's administration and Port Authority of New York and New Jersey has focused scrutiny on lawyer David Samson, who has long and close relationship with Christie; since Christie named Samson to lead Port Authority, governor’s power has grown and Samson’s law firm has prospered.
